ListTemplate.Name: meetings
ListTemplate.Description: List of meetings attached to the workspace.

ListTemplate.Name: agenda
ListTemplate.Description: Create an agenda list when you want to outline the meeting topics, who will cover them, and how much time each presenter is allotted.

ListTemplate.Name: people
ListTemplate.Description: List of meeting workspace users and their roles.

ListTemplate.Name: decision
ListTemplate.Description: Create a decisions list when you want to keep track of all decisions made at the meeting. Attendees and others can then review the results of the meeting.

ListTemplate.Name: doclib
ListTemplate.Description: Create a document library when you have a collection of documents or other files that you want to share. Document libraries support features such as sub-folders, file versioning, and check-in/check-out.

ListTemplate.Name: discuss
ListTemplate.Description: Create a discussion board when you want to provide a place for newsgroup-style discussions. Discussion boards provide features for managing discussion threads and ensuring that only approved posts appear.

ListTemplate.Name: favorite
ListTemplate.Description: Create a links list when you have links to Web pages or other resources that you want to share.

ListTemplate.Name: objectiv
ListTemplate.Description: Create an objectives list when you want to let your attendees know your goals for the meeting. Every meeting should begin with a purpose in mind.

ListTemplate.Name: imglib
ListTemplate.Description: Create a picture library when you have pictures you want to share. Picture libraries provide special features for managing and displaying pictures, such as thumbnails, download options, and a slide show.

ListTemplate.Name: tasks
ListTemplate.Description: Create a tasks list when you want to track a group of work items that you or your team needs to complete.

ListTemplate.Name: textbox
ListTemplate.Description: Create a text box when you want to insert custom text, such as instructions or motivational quotes, into the meeting.

ListTemplate.Name: thgbring
ListTemplate.Description: Create a list of things that attendees should bring to be prepared for the meeting, such as notebooks, handouts, or something to eat.

ListTemplate.Name: wkspglib
ListTemplate.Description: List of meeting workspace pages.

ListTemplate.Name: custlist
ListTemplate.Description: Create a custom list when you want to specify your own columns. The list opens as a Web page and lets you add or edit items one at a time.

ListTemplate.Name: gridlist
ListTemplate.Description: Create a custom list when you want to specify your own columns. The list opens in a spreadsheet-like environment for convenient data entry, editing, and formatting. It requires a Windows SharePoint Services-compatible list datasheet control and ActiveX control support.

ListTemplate.Name: announce
ListTemplate.Description: Create an announcements list when you want a place to share news, status, and other short bits of information.

ListTemplate.Name: contacts
ListTemplate.Description: Create a contacts list when you want to manage information about people that your team works with such as customers or partners. You can share information between your contacts list and Windows SharePoint Services-compatible contacts programs.

ListTemplate.Name: events
ListTemplate.Description: Create an events list when you want a calendar-based view of upcoming meetings, deadlines, and other important events. You can share information between your events list and Windows SharePoint Services-compatible events programs.

ListTemplate.Name: voting
ListTemplate.Description: Create a survey when you want to poll other Web site users. Surveys provide features that allow you to quickly create questions and define how users specify their answers.

ListTemplate.Name: webtemp
ListTemplate.Description: Store your custom site designs in the Site Template Gallery for future use.

ListTemplate.Name: wplib
ListTemplate.Description: Place to store Web Parts

ListTemplate.Name: listtemp
ListTemplate.Description: Make a template available for use in list creation by adding to this gallery. Default list templates are not shown.

ListTemplate.Name: datasrcs
ListTemplate.Description: Data sources for this web.

ListTemplate.Name: xmlform
ListTemplate.Description: Create a form library when you have XML-based business forms, such as status reports or purchase orders, that you want to manage. These libraries require a Windows SharePoint Services-compatible XML editor, such as Microsoft Office InfoPath.

ListTemplate.Name: issue
ListTemplate.Description: Create an issues list when you want to manage a set of issues or problems. You can assign, prioritize, and follow the progress of issues from start to finish.

DocumentTemplate.Description: This document library will not use templates.
A blank Microsoft Office Word document.
A blank Microsoft Office FrontPage HTML document.
A blank Microsoft Office Excel document.
A blank Microsoft Office PowerPoint document.
A blank Microsoft basic page ASPX document.
Design this empty form to meet your specific needs.

Field.Name: CheckedOutUserId
Field.DisplayName: ID of the User who has the item Checked Out

Field.Name: LinkCheckedOutTitle
Field.AuthoringInfo: (link to username to user details page)

Field.Name: RelatedIssue
Field.Description: Type the Issue ID of one issue
